text: Ke yiniharule bhanchan ki usale ‘‘(paigambarale) yasala'i svayam raceka hun?’’ (Ho'ina) baru tyo timro palanakartako tarphabata satya ho, taki tapar'inle tiniharula'i savadhana garnus, jasako pasama tapa'imbhanda pahila kohi savadhana garnevala a'ena. Taki yiniharule sahi marga prapta garna sakun
